variants.Description in input context: A53T substitution dominates the growth kinetics

Material used.Description: Fluorescence analysis of human-mouse variants to assess growth kinetics

Readout description.Result Description: Fluorescence intensity reduced by 40% for the variant NM_000033.3:c.53T>A.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type α-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Fluorescence intensity greater than 70% on day 3.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Fluorescence intensity less than 50% on day 3.
